Uses of Interface
oracle.ucp.jdbc.PoolDataSource

Packages that use PoolDataSource
oracle.ucp.jdbc Includes various interfaces and classes used by applications to work with JDBC connections and a connection pool. 
 

Uses of PoolDataSource in oracle.ucp.jdbc
 

Subinterfaces of PoolDataSource in oracle.ucp.jdbc
 interface PoolXADataSource
          A Universal Connection Pool-enabled XA data source.
 

Classes in oracle.ucp.jdbc that implement PoolDataSource
 class PoolDataSourceImpl
          A connection pool-aware data source.
 class PoolXADataSourceImpl
          A connection pool-aware data source.
 

Methods in oracle.ucp.jdbc that return PoolDataSource
static PoolDataSource PoolDataSourceFactory.getPoolDataSource()
          Obtains a pool-enabled PoolDataSource instance.
